mapper.select: SELECT A.MENU_ID /* 메뉴ID */ , A.MENU_NM /* 메뉴명 */ , A.SORT_NO /* 정렬번호 */ , A.URL_VRB_CNTN /* URL변수내용 */ , A.URL_CLSF_CD /* URL분류코드 */ , A.URL_NM /* URL명 */ , A.SHTN_NM /* 단축명 */ , A.APLY_YN /* 적용여부 */ , A.DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ , NVL(TO_CHAR(A.HND_DETL_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS HND_DETL_DTM /* 조작상세일시 */ , NVL((SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = A.HND_EMPNO), '') AS HND_EMPNO /* 조작사원명 */ FROM IBIMS005B A WHERE 1=1 AND A.SCRN_APLY_SHP_CD = 'M' AND A.MENU_ID LIKE '%' || #{menuId} || '%' /* 메뉴명 */ ORDER BY A.MENU_ID

SELECT A.MENU_ID /* 메뉴ID */ , A.MENU_NM /* 메뉴명 */ , A.SORT_NO /* 정렬번호 */ , A.SHTN_NM /* 단축명 */ , A.URL_CLSF_CD /* URL분류코드 */ , A.URL_VRB_CNTN /* URL변수내용 */ , A.URL_NM /* URL명 */ , A.APLY_YN /* 적용여부 */ , A.DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ , NVL(TO_CHAR(A.HND_DETL_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS HND_DETL_DTM /* 조작상세일시 */ , NVL((SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = A.HND_EMPNO), '') AS HND_EMPNO /* 조작사원명 */ FROM IBIMS005B A WHERE 1=1 AND A.HGRK_MENU_ID = #{menuId} /* 메뉴명 */ ORDER BY A.MENU_ID

SELECT LTRIM(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(T1.MENU_NM, ' > '), ' > ') AS menuNm , T1.MENU_ID FROM IBIMS005B T1 WHERE T1.SCRN_APLY_SHP_CD = 'S' AND T1.APLY_YN = 'Y' AND T1.DEL_YN = 'N' AND ( T1.MENU_ID LIKE '%' || #{param} || '%' OR T1.MENU_NM LIKE '%' || #{param} || '%' ) START WITH T1.HGRK_MENU_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR T1.MENU_ID = T1.HGRK_MENU_ID ORDER BY T1.HGRK_MENU_ID, T1.MENU_ID;
SELECT MENU_ID , SORT_NO , URL_VRB_CNTN , MENU_NM , SHTN_NM , URL_NM , URL_CLSF_CD , HND_DETL_DTM , HND_EMPNO FROM IBIMS005B WHERE MENU_ID = #{menuId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IBIMS005B ( MENU_ID , MENU_NM , SHTN_NM , SCRN_APLY_SHP_CD , SORT_NO , MENU_LVL , URL_CLSF_CD , URL_VRB_CNTN , APLY_YN , APLY_DT , DEL_YN , HND_DETL_DTM , HND_EMPNO ) VALUES ( #{menuId} , #{menuNm} , #{shtnNm} , 'M' , #{sortNo} , 2 , #{urlClsfCd} , SUBSTR(MENU_ID, 3,5) , 'Y' , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , 'N' , SYSDATE , #{hndEmpno} )

#{menuId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.MENU_ID /* 메뉴ID */ , A.SORT_NO /* 정렬번호 */ , A.URL_VRB_CNTN /* URL매개변수내용 */ , A.MENU_NM /* 메뉴명 */ , A.SHTN_NM /* 단축명 */ , A.URL_NM /* URL명 */ , A.URL_CLSF_CD /* URL분류코드 */ , A.APLY_YN /* 적용여부 */ , A.DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ , NVL(TO_CHAR(A.HND_DETL_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS HND_DETL_DTM , NVL((SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = A.HND_EMPNO), '') AS HND_EMP_NM FROM IBIMS005B A WHERE A.SCRN_APLY_SHP_CD = 'S' /* 화면적용형태코드 */ AND A.HGRK_MENU_ID = #{menuId} /* 상위메뉴ID */ ORDER BY A.SORT_NO
SELECT MENU_ID , SORT_NO , URL_VRB_CNTN , MENU_NM , SHTN_NM , URL_NM , URL_CLSF_CD , HND_DETL_DTM , HND_EMPNO FROM IBIMS005B WHERE MENU_ID = #{menuId}
mapper.update:

mapper.select: SELECT #{athCd} AS athCd /* 권한코드 */ , T1.MENU_ID /* 메뉴ID */ , T1.MENU_NM /* 메뉴명 */ , T1.MENU_LVL /* 메뉴레벨 */ , NVL(T2.MDFY_RGHT_CCD , '') AS mdfyRghtCcd /* 수정권한구분코드(1: 조회, 2: 수정가능) */ , NVL(TO_CHAR(T2.HND_DETL_DTM, 'YYYYMMDD'), '') AS hndDt , NVL(TO_CHAR(T2.HND_DETL_DTM, 'HH24MISS'), '') AS hndTm , NVL((SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = T2.HND_EMPNO), '') AS hndEmpno /* 조작사원명 */ FROM IBIMS005B T1 LEFT JOIN IBIMS007B T2 ON T1.MENU_ID = T2.MENU_ID /* 메뉴ID */ AND T2.ATH_CD = #{athCd} WHERE 1=1 AND T1.APLY_YN = 'Y' AND T1.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T1.SCRN_APLY_SHP_CD = 'S' /* 화면적용형태코드 */ ORDER BY T1.MENU_ID /* 정렬번호 */

SELECT S.MENU_ID , S.MENU_NM , S.URL_VRB_CNTN , S.SHTN_NM AS TITLE , M.SHTN_NM AS HG_TITLE , S.HGRK_MENU_ID , S.URL_NM FROM IBIMS005B S LEFT JOIN IBIMS005B M ON M.MENU_ID = S.HGRK_MENU_ID WHERE S.MENU_ID = #{menuId}

SELECT A.MENU_NM || CASE WHEN B.MENU_NM IS NOT NULL THEN ' > ' || B.MENU_NM ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN C.MENU_NM IS NOT NULL THEN ' > ' || C.MENU_NM ELSE '' END AS MENU_NAME , NVL(A.MENU_ID, '') AS LV1_ID /* 메뉴ID */ , NVL(B.MENU_ID, '') AS LV2_ID /* 메뉴ID */ , NVL(C.MENU_ID, '') AS LV3_ID /* 메뉴ID */ FROM IBIMS005B A INNER JOIN IBIMS005B B ON A.MENU_ID = B.HGRK_MENU_ID AND A.MENU_LVL = 1 /* 메뉴레벨 */ AND B.MENU_LVL = 2 LEFT JOIN IBIMS005B C ON B.MENU_ID = C.HGRK_MENU_ID AND C.MENU_LVL = 3 WHERE 1=1 AND B.DEL_YN != 'Y'
AND ( A.MENU_NM LIKE '%'|| #{menuNm} || '%' OR B.MENU_NM LIKE '%'|| #{menuNm} || '%' OR C.MENU_NM LIKE '%'|| #{menuNm} || '%' )
ORDER BY A.SORT_NO ASC , B.SORT_NO ASC , C.SORT_NO ASC

SELECT T1.MENU_ID /* 메뉴ID */ , T1.MENU_NM /* 메뉴명 */ , T1.HGRK_MENU_ID /* 상위메뉴ID */ , T1.SCRN_APLY_SHP_CD /* 화면적용형태코드 */ , T1.MENU_LVL /* 메뉴레벨 */ FROM IBIMS005B T1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MENU_ID FROM IBIMS007B WHERE 1=1 AND ATH_CD = (SELECT ATH_CD FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = #{empno}) GROUP BY MENU_ID /* MENU_ID가 키값이 아닌상황임 */ ) T2 ON T1.MENU_ID = T2.MENU_ID WHERE 1=1 AND T1.APLY_YN = 'Y' AND T1.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T1.MENU_LVL IS NOT NULL ORDER BY T1.MENU_LVL, CASE WHEN T1.MENU_ID LIKE 'TB%' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, T1.MENU_ID
